response.overview: Meet the Sniper, one of nine playable character classes in Team Fortress 2.  Name: Sniper Role: Support Weapons: Sniper Rifle / SMG / Kukri  In his former life as a tracker of dangerous game in the unforgiving Australian outback, the Sniper would spend months by himself. Prolonged isolation taught him a valuable lesson: You don't have to rely on other people if you never miss.
response.title: Meet the Snpier
